detail_desc: Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in supple leather. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, a zip at the back and pockets in the side seams. Lined at the top.
Pleated, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist.
Short skirt in a textured cotton weave with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in a fine rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and an overlocked hem.
Double-layered hats in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and an embroidered pattern on the front.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details and raw-edge hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boots in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Shopper in soft suede with handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and large outer compartment. Unlined. Size 31x35x13 cm.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the front and a tie detail at the waist. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, an open section at the front and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in washed denim with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases front and back.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake back pocket and a detachable, braided belt with metal rings.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and slim legs.
Lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, ribbed bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back. Wide elastic side stripes and matching elastication at the waist.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sandals in imitation leather with appliqués at the top and an adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastener at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hooded jumper in a soft knit with lacing at the top, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic pointelle cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen, with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, cut-out sections at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a sewn-on bow tie, print motif on the front and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Striped shirt in airy Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck wrap dress in soft velour with a narrow tie at the waist. Gathers at the shoulders, short sleeves with a slit, seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Playsuit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with short raglan sleeves, a decorative bow at the waist and narrow elastication around the neckline, waist and sleeves.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend. Round neck with a press-stud and decorative buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with frill trims at the front, adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with elastication at the top and two flounces that continue over the arms. Unlined.
Soft body in lace and patterned mesh with cap sleeves and a deep V-neck at the back. Lined gusset with press-studs.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Slippers in soft fabric with a decorative moccasin seam at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and imitation suede soles with anti-slip protectors.

Small shoulder bag in sturdy, crocodile-patterned imitation leather with imitation suede details. Zip at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. One outer compartment with a concealed magnetic fastener on each long side of the bag. Lined. Depth 5 cm, height 12.5 cm, width 19 cm.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neck and all-over print. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Hoodie in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded appliqués at the top, a turtle neck and low dropped shoulders.
Coat in a soft, marled wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and large patch front pockets. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in print-patterned satin. Lined.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, padded hood with a foldover faux fur trim that attaches with press-studs and can be turned up. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal, zipped handwarmer pockets, side pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the back and cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dungaree shorts in a soft cotton weave with press studs at the sides and adjustable straps with a press-stud at the front. Fake front pockets, a real back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.

Ankle-length trousers in a cotton weave with a lightly brushed finish. Regular waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Adjustable tab with buttons at the sides, and gently tapered legs.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey, one patterned pair. Elasticated, drawstring waist and legs with flounce-trimmed hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in a stretch weave with a concealed zip at the back and decorative buttons at one side of the hem. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs with stripes down the sides and creases.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back. Lined gusset.
